original_text: But when Amasa went to summon Judah, he took longer than the time the king had set for him.
korean_text: 아마사가 유다 사람을 모으러 가더니 왕이 정한 기일에 지체된지라

sentences.original_text: But when Amasa went to summon Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 아마사가 유다를 소환하러 갔을 때

sentences.original_text: he took longer than the time
the king had set for him
